text: allaah ne jo dhan dilaaya hai apane rasool ko is bastee vaalon[1] se, vah allaah, rasool, (aapake) sameepavartiyon, anaathon, nirdhanon tatha yaatriyon ke lie hai; taaki vah (dhan) phirata na rah[2] jaaye tumhaare dhanavaanon ke beech aur jo pradaan kar de rasool, tum use le lo aur rok den tumhen jisase, tum usase ruk jao tatha allaah se darate raho, nishchay allaah kadee yaatana dene vaala hai
